title: tipography loves numbers.
content:
Good morning.

I’m a young italian graphic designer (only a student, for now).  
I have to complete an exam for my university about typography, so I would ask if someone can suggest to me some books or other resources about design of numbers.

Thank you very much

Luca

(Congratulations for this forum and site. I’ve learned a lot of interesting things.  
Already bookmarked.)

 [‹ Critical eyes I need your opinion!](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112330/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38669 "Go to previous forum topic") [Agriculture Management Logo Ideas anyone? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112330/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38697 "Go to next forum topic")
author: capitanfresco
